data.name: RzAlert.CloseButtonAriaLabel
data.comment: Aria-label for the close button on the alert component.

data.name: RzAvatar.DefaultAlternateText
data.comment: Default alt text for the avatar image if DisplayName is not provided.

data.name: RzBreadcrumb.AriaLabel
data.comment: Aria-label for the breadcrumb navigation container.

data.name: RzBrowser.DesktopScreenTitle
data.comment: Title attribute for the desktop screen size button in the browser simulation.

data.name: RzBrowser.TabletScreenTitle
data.comment: Title attribute for the tablet screen size button in the browser simulation.

data.name: RzBrowser.PhoneScreenTitle
data.comment: Title attribute for the phone screen size button in the browser simulation.

data.name: RzButton.AssistiveLabelDefault
data.comment: Default aria-label for a button component if not explicitly specified.

data.name: RzCodeViewer.DefaultViewerTitle
data.comment: Default title displayed in the header of the code viewer component.

data.name: RzCodeViewer.CopyButtonAriaLabel
data.comment: Aria-label for the copy-to-clipboard button.

data.name: RzCodeViewer.CopyButtonTitleCopy
data.comment: Title attribute/tooltip text for the copy button before copying.

data.name: RzCodeViewer.CopyButtonTitleCopied
data.comment: Title attribute/tooltip text for the copy button after copying.

data.name: RzCodeViewer.ExpandButtonAriaLabel
data.comment: Aria-label for the button that expands/collapses the code view.

data.name: RzDarkModeToggle.AriaLabel
data.comment: Aria-label for the button that toggles between light and dark themes.

data.name: RzDateEdit.AriaLabel
data.comment: Aria-label for the overall date picker component wrapper.

data.name: RzDateEdit.InputAriaLabel
data.comment: Aria-label specifically for the date input field.

data.name: RzNavbar.ToggleButtonScreenReaderTextDefault
data.comment: Default screen reader text for the mobile navigation toggle button.

data.name: RzProgress.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default aria-label for the progress bar component if not explicitly specified.

data.name: RzQuickReference.DefaultTitle
data.comment: Default title displayed above the quick reference link list.

data.name: RzSearchButton.DefaultLabel
data.comment: Default text label and aria-label for the search button if not explicitly specified.

data.name: RzSidebar.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for the Sidebar component

data.name: RzSidebarTrigger.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for the SidebarTrigger component

data.name: RzSteps.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default aria-label for the steps container.

data.name: RzSteps.CompletedStepSrText
data.comment: Screen reader text announced for a completed step indicator.

data.name: RzBrowser.ScreenSizeGroupAriaLabel
data.comment: Aria-label for the group of buttons controlling the simulated screen size.

data.name: RzQuickReference.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default aria-label for the quick reference navigation container.

data.name: RzArticle.DefaultAsideAriaLabel
data.comment: Default aria-label for the aside element in the RzArticle component.

data.name: RzEmbeddedPreview.DefaultIFrameTitle
data.comment: Default title attribute for the iframe in the RzEmbeddedPreview component, used for accessibility.

data.name: RzPagination.PreviousButtonLabel
data.comment: Label for the 'Previous' page button in pagination controls.

data.name: RzPagination.NextButtonLabel
data.comment: Label for the 'Next' page button in pagination controls.

data.name: RzPagination.NavigationAriaLabel
data.comment: ARIA label for the main pagination navigation container.

data.name: RzTable.SortButtonAriaLabelFormat
data.comment: ARIA label for sortable table header buttons. {0} is column name, {1} is current sort direction (e.g., "ascending", "descending", "unsorted").

data.name: RzTable.SortDirectionAscendingLong
data.comment: Text for ARIA label indicating ascending sort.

data.name: RzTable.SortDirectionDescendingLong
data.comment: Text for ARIA label indicating descending sort.

data.name: RzTable.SortDirectionNone
data.comment: Text for ARIA label indicating column is not sorted.

data.name: RzTable.DefaultEmptyMessage
data.comment: Default message shown in RzTableBody when there are no items and no EmptyTemplate is provided.

data.name: RzIndicator.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for RzIndicator

data.name: RzAvatar.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for RzAvatar container

data.name: RzDropdownMenu.TriggerAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for the dropdown trigger

data.name: RzDropdownMenu.ContentAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for the dropdown content area

data.name: RzDropdownMenu.SubTriggerAriaLabelFormat
data.comment: Format for sub-menu trigger ARIA label, {0} is item title

data.name: RzDropdownMenu.SubContentAriaLabelFormat
data.comment: Format for sub-menu content ARIA label, {0} is item title

data.name: RzPopover.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for RzPopover

data.name: RzPopover.TriggerAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for the trigger

data.name: RzPopover.ContentAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for the content area

data.name: RzNavigationMenu.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for RzNavigationMenu

data.name: RzSheet.CloseButtonText
data.comment: Screen reader text for the close button in the Sheet component

data.name: RzSidebarRail.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for the SidebarRail component

data.name: RzCarousel.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for the carousel region

data.name: RzCarousel.PreviousButtonAriaLabel
data.comment: ARIA label for the previous slide button

data.name: RzCarousel.NextButtonAriaLabel
data.comment: ARIA label for the next slide button

data.name: RzDialog.CloseButtonAriaLabel
data.comment: Aria-label for the close button.

data.name: RzDialog.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for the dialog.

data.name: RzEmpty.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for RzEmpty

data.name: RzBrowser.PreviewIFrameTitle
data.comment: Default title for the iframe in RzBrowser

data.name: RzCommand.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for the RzCommand container.

data.name: RzCommandDialog.DefaultTitle
data.comment: Default title for the RzCommandDialog header.

data.name: RzCommandDialog.DefaultDescription
data.value: Search for a command to run...
data.comment: Default description for the RzCommandDialog header.

data.name: RzTabs.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for the tabs container.

data.name: RzSwitch.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for RzSwitch

data.name: RzNativeSelect.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for RzNativeSelect

data.name: RzCombobox.DefaultPlaceholder
data.comment: Default ARIA placeholder for RzCombobox

data.name: RzCalendar.DefaultAriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for the calendar component.

data.name: RzPagination.AriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for the pagination navigation landmark.

data.name: PaginationPrevious.Label
data.comment: Default visible label for the previous-page pagination link.

data.name: PaginationPrevious.AriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for the previous-page pagination link.

data.name: PaginationNext.Label
data.comment: Default visible label for the next-page pagination link.

data.name: PaginationNext.AriaLabel
data.comment: Default ARIA label for the next-page pagination link.

data.name: PaginationEllipsis.MorePages
data.comment: Screen-reader-only label for a pagination ellipsis item.
